Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/46th
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California due to street blockage near California/46th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
